changeSet.author: Vladimir Nomokonov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `answers` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `messagetemplate_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `status_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `UK_l5g2oxrdmst1kvqayn8jpb4a2` (`subject`), KEY `FKj4f1jesfy13tt1cpv3eh19uem` (`messagetemplate_id`), KEY `FK75xl8s2qx7qq1vd4rayswm8q5` (`status_id`) )
changeSet.comment: table answers creation for AutoAnswers entity
